ABOUT.title: About
content: I'm expertise in building, deploying and maintaining highly scalable web applications using cloud platforms like AWS.
7+ years of experience in developing high quality web application products with PHP and NodeJS frameworks
6+ years of experience in designing and developing the AWS cloud architecture and infrastructure design and maintenance.
2+ years of Full-stack experience in designing and developing UI components with HTML, CSS, Vue, Vuex, Material Design.

EDUCATION.title: Education
content: FY 2008-12 - B.E in Computer Science and Engineering, Anna University, Chennai, India
FY 2008 - Completed XII in RamaKrishna matric higher secondary school with 75%
FY 2006 - Completed X in ABC higher secondary school with 75%

content: 7+ years of experience in developing high quality web application products with PHP and NodeJS frameworks
